[/quote]
If you know nothing about scar, how can you know if it’s good or bad?[/quote]
Most people who don’t know any scripting or programming languages usually consider anything hat looks remotely like code “good”

item.title: My first auto talker
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

I know it’s Really bad but it’s just to start out and learn how to script so please no flaming and i hope u enjoy it xD

[code]// My first autotalker by slinkyman24

const
color = ‘red:’; // Set your color there
effect = ‘wave2:’; //Set your effect here
say = ‘Buying santa!’; //Set what to say here

program timetillstart;
begin
Writeln(‘This script will start in 3 seconds’);
Writeln(‘3’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘2’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘1’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘Begin and good luck autoing!!!’);
end;

Procedure say;
begin
wait(1000)
SendKeys(color+effect+say)
sleep(1)
end;

begin
timetillstart;
repeat
say;
wait(2500);
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
